name: HeadsUpQuiz
0:
”Alexa open heads up quiz”
”play animals”
”play places”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: heads up quiz
des:
This is a game that will test your knowledge. It's a guessing game, where you will hear hints about something or someone that's written on a card. Items that belong to the same category are grouped together into decks. You will receive hints and your job is to guess as many cards as possible.

The game has 5 decks:
Animals is available for free
Places is available for free
Christmas is available for free
Superheroes is available through in skill purchasing
Celebrities is available through in skill purchasing

You firstly need to select your deck. Once you've done this you will have 100 seconds to guess as many cards as possible. 

When you give an answer, Alexa will validate if that answer is correct or not. If the answer is wrong, you'll also hear another clue. You have 6 attempts to get it right. 

When Alexa runs out of clues she will move on to the next card. 

To hear a hint for the current card you can say "hint". There is a maximum of 6 hints per card. After that, Alexa will move on to the next card.

To skip the current card you can say "pass". After that, Alexa will give you a hint for the next card.

When the timer ends, Alexa will tell you how many answers you got right and it will also give you the possibility to unlock any answers that you might have missed. Unlock answers is a feature that is available through in skill purchasing. 
--------------------------------------
A short skill demo is available at: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GVz1Q80doNw
--------------------------------------
Your feedback is very important to us. If you have any suggestions, please email us at contactus@msimconsulting.com

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
